{{Wired embedded system |brand=Synology |model=DiskStation DS212 |revision= |asin=B005XXVMHE;GB; |newegg=N82E16822108091 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |est_release_date=11/2011 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5.4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6282 |cpu1_cspeed=1.6 GHz |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model=ST25P32V6P |fla2=512 KiB |fla2_brand=Atmel |fla2_model=AT25F512B |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=J1108BFBG-DJ-F |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SATA |expansion_usb_num=3 |expansion_sata_num=2 |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, JP3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1318 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=I2C Bus Serial RTC;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, USB 3.0 Host Controller;NEC;PD720200;;1;,,, USB 2.0 HUB Controller; Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller;Microchip Technology;PIC16F883;;1;,,, P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4953GM;;2;,,, P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435GM;;1;,,, N-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4410GM;;3;,,, 3A, 24V Asynchronous Step‐Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT1525;;5;,,, 5V, 12V Synchronous-Rectified Buck Controller;uPI Semi;uP6103;;1; |flags=SD Card slot, RTC w/ battery, fan |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.5.9; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32.12; |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |oui_eth=00:11:32 }} {{TagLine|2-Bay Diskless Network Attached Storage (DS212)}} :[https://www.synology.com/en-global/support/download/DS214 Support page]
It's a 2-bay NAS. This device has 2 USB 3.0 ports and 1 USB 2.0 port.
{{See also|List of NAS Devices|Synology DiskStation Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6282 @1.6GHz (''Armada 300'' ARM v5) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 4MB SPI NOR Flash, 2x SATA *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *Power: 12V, 5.4A via barrel
===See also=== :;[[Synology DiskStation Devices]] *[[Synology DiskStation DS212]] • [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (@1.6GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS212j]] • [[Marvell]] 88F6281 (@1.2GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS212+]] • [[Marvell]] 88FR131 (@2.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213]] • [[Marvell]] 88FR131 (@2.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213air]] • [[Marvell]] 88F6282 (@1.6GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213j]] • [[Marvell]] ''ARMADA 370'' (@1.2GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS213+]] • [[Freescale]] P1022 (@1.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS214]] • [[Marvell]] ''ARMADA XP'' (@1.0GHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS214se]] • [[Marvell]] ''ARMADA 370'' (@800MHz) *[[Synology DiskStation DS214+]] • [[Marvell]] MV78230 (@1.33GHz)
